pullRequest.title: Add GranteeService.getVisibleUsers()
pullRequest.bodyText:
Graylog users are visible to other users if the user that is running
the query has users:read permissions on certain (or all) users.
The users:read permission can be conveniently assigned by using the
new User Inspector role.
/jenkins-pr-deps Graylog2/graylog-plugin-enterprise#1833

commit.message:
Add GranteeService.getVisibleUsers()

Graylog users are visible to other users if the user that is running
the query has either the `users:list` permission, or explicit
`users:view` permissions on certain users.

The `users:list` permission can be conveniently assigned by using the
new `User Inspector` role.

beforeCommit.message:
Add GranteeService.getVisibleUsers()

Graylog users are visible to other users if the user that is running
the query has either the `users:list` permission, or explicit
`users:view` permissions on certain users.

The `users:list` permission can be conveniently assigned by using the
new `User Inspector` role.

commit.message:
Rename EventNotification GRNType in frontend

Prior to this change, the dependency resolution which is using the
content pack mechanism tried to find the event notification type with
'event_notification' which is not a registered type in content pack.

This change will rename the type to `notification` so the dependency
resolution via content packs works again.
user permissions are still checked against the username
